languages.text: "Мне нравятся твои речи, светлый воин. В них есть что-то от святых гимнов, что мы с сестрами поем на поле боя".
"I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."
languages.original_text: "Мне нравятся твои речи, светлый воин. В них есть что-то от святых гимнов, что мы с сестрами поем на поле боя".

traits.locale_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我喜欢你战斗的怒吼，神圣的战士。这让我想起修女姐妹们在战场上吟唱的圣歌。”
languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

traits.locale_text: “我喜欢你战斗的怒吼，神圣的战士。这让我想起修女姐妹们在战场上吟唱的圣歌。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai aimé votre allocution, guerrier de lumière. Elle m'a rappelé les hymnes sacrés que mes sœurs et moi chantons sur le champ de bataille. »
languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aimé votre allocution, guerrier de lumière. Elle m'a rappelé les hymnes sacrés que mes sœurs et moi chantons sur le champ de bataille. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Mir gefällt Eure Oration, strahlender Krieger. Sie erinnert mich an die heiligen Hymnen, die meine Schwestern und ich auf dem Schlachtfeld singen."
languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

traits.locale_text: "Mir gefällt Eure Oration, strahlender Krieger. Sie erinnert mich an die heiligen Hymnen, die meine Schwestern und ich auf dem Schlachtfeld singen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「賢い戦士よ、あなたの演説、嫌いじゃないわ。戦場でシスターたちと歌う神聖な賛美歌を思い出す」
languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

traits.locale_text: 「賢い戦士よ、あなたの演説、嫌いじゃないわ。戦場でシスターたちと歌う神聖な賛美歌を思い出す」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Me gustan tus oraciones, brillante guerrero. Me recuerdan a los himnos sagrados que mis hermanas y yo cantamos sobre el campo de batalla».
languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustan tus oraciones, brillante guerrero. Me recuerdan a los himnos sagrados que mis hermanas y yo cantamos sobre el campo de batalla».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

languages.text: "Söylevlerin hoşuma gidiyor parlak savaşçı. Kız kardeşlerimle savaş alanında söylediğim ilahileri hatırlatıyor bana."
languages.original_text: "I like your oration, bright warrior. It reminds me of the sacred hymns my sisters and I sing on the battlefield."

traits.locale_text: "Söylevlerin hoşuma gidiyor parlak savaşçı. Kız kardeşlerimle savaş alanında söylediğim ilahileri hatırlatıyor bana."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
